t: What brand is good for a yoga mat in Amazon India? My priority is durability of the mat as most reviews show they chip off within a month. Its for my Dad, who was comfortable with hard surface, but wants to avoid cold floors. - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Best mat is a woolen blanket folded lengthwise to have four layers. Spread a cotton sheet similarly folded over it. That protects from cool floor as well as absorbs sweat and keep body (skin) free from any reaction with chemicals of the mat( which can be allergic).
